name: We Come To Attack
description:
How to Play:

Use the Left and Right Arrows to move back and fourth

Use the A or D button to move back and fourth

Space Button to Shot.

The larger enemy is worth 5 points 

The longer enemy is worth 10 points.

Information:

A basic Space Shooter game made with in 64*64 resolution, for the lowrez game jam, Music made by me, all sounds made by me, other then the enemy shooter sound 8bit sound effects packs https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack used

Art made by default Lowrez DargonRuby GTK

made with the DragonRuby GTK
